questions.question: When will the activities for each day end?
questions.answer: The schedule for the orientation will be sent out soon.

questions.question: Is it necessary to attend the orientation?
questions.answer: Attending the orientation is not compulsory. However, it is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity that will set your exciting university journey into motion like nothing else. We have a week planned for you like none other!

questions.question: Is it necessary to bring my parents on the first day of orientation?
questions.answer: No, it is not mandatory. However, this is a chance for them to clear their doubts and learn about the university.

questions.question: Can both my parents come to the Q&A session?
questions.answer: Yes, you can bring both your parents to the Q&A session.

questions.question: When are my parents supposed to arrive for the Q&A session?
questions.answer: The schedule for the orientation will be emailed to you.

questions.question: Should all my documents be attested?
questions.answer: The respective department should be consulted for this information.

questions.question: What documents do we need to bring for registration?
questions.answer: For entry at the gate, bring your NUST selection letter, official ID i.e. CNIC, passport, and vaccination card. For registration at your respective school, the school will send you instructions on what documents to bring.

questions.question: FSC students don’t have their HSSC degree yet. Can the original result card be submitted in place of the certificate?
questions.answer: Yes, it can be submitted in place of the certificate.

questions.question: I am not attending the orientation. Can I submit the registration documents on the first day of classes?
questions.answer: Yes, you can submit documents on the first day.

questions.question: My department hasn’t sent me the joining instructions yet. What do I do?
questions.answer: Contact your respective departments for the instructions.

questions.question: Do I need proof of COVID vaccination to join?
questions.answer: Yes, you will need to show proof of COVID vaccination to join.

questions.question: Do I have to submit a negative PCR report if I have already been vaccinated?
questions.answer: You do not have to submit a PCR report if you have already been vaccinated.

questions.question: How do I get the orientation merch?
questions.answer: A form will be sent to you to avail the limited merch. Payment will be done through bank transfer or easypaisa. You will receive your merch on the first day of orientation.

questions.question: Can I pay for the orientation merch in person?
questions.answer: Orientation Merch is currently only available through easy paisa or bank transfer.

questions.question: I haven’t been assigned an OG group yet. What do I do?
questions.answer: If you are selected in later merit lists, your OG group will also be assigned late. However, if you are still not assigned one, contact us on our official orientation email.

questions.question: Do I have to stay with my OG group throughout the orientation?
questions.answer: Your OG groups are going to be the highlight of your Orientation, this is where you will make your first friends at university, and create beautiful memories. Staying with them is going to uplift your orientation experience by tenfold.

questions.question: Can I join my hostel before/after the scheduled date for joining the hostel?
Is there accommodation available for parents of hostellites?
questions.answer: There is no hostel accommodation for out-of-city parents.

questions.question: Do I have to report to the hostel before or on the first day of orientation?
questions.answer: Students who have received hostels inside NUST must report a day before orientation. Students with private hostels can join orientation on the scheduled days.
